title.en: Practical Works in Physics of Materials I. Mechanics and Heat
title.et: Materjalifüüsika praktikum I. Mehaanika ja soojus

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The practical works include determination of the modulus of elasticity and torsion, Brinell hardness, thermal expansion coefficient, specific heat capacity and thermal conductivity of various materials,  and the moments of inertia for some bodies.
description.et: Praktikumis määratakse materjalide elastsusmoodulit, nihkemoodulit, Brinelli kõvadust, soojuspaisumistegurit, erisoojust ja soojusjuhtivust  ning vedeliku viskoossust.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to teach the mechanical and thermal behaviour of various materials, to show the methods of determination of the characteristics of materials, and to give some experience of laboratory work.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on tutvustada materjalide ja objektide mehhaaniliste ja soojuslike omaduste  mõõtmise meetodeid  ning anda laboritöö kogemusi nende omaduste määramisel.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course a student:
1) knows mechanical and thermal behaviour of materials and standard methods for determination of the characteristics;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab materjalide mehhaanilisi ja soojuslikke omadusi ja nende määramise standardseid meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) has practical experience of measuring and determination of mechanical and thermal characteristics of materials;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omab materjalide mehhaaniliste ja  soojuslike omaduste praktilise määramise kogemust ja tunneb vastavaid teooriaid;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can record and process experiment data in case of the topics covered in the course, and present  results.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab katset protokollida, käsitletud teemade raames katseandmeid töödelda ja tulemusi esitada.

description.et: Nõuetekohaselt vormistatud praktilise töö protokolli esitamine ja tulemuste kaitsmine õppejõu ees.

grade_preconditions.et: A student is allowed to a practical work after he/she has acquired the theoretical basics of the topic. Measurements data and results have to be presented in a written record.

grade_evaluation.et: All the practical works must be done and answered

debt_elimination.et: If any work has not been performed in the scheduled time, the teacher may determine a later date.

resources.mandatory_materials: Instructions of the practical works in materials physics
resources.recommended_materials: D. Halliday, R. Resnick, J. Walker. Fundamentals of Physics

description.et: Young modulus, shear modulus and Poisson ratio
